sen.j: 五条駅 (京阪) - 京都市東山区にある京阪本線の駅。
sen.e: Gojo Station (of Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on Keihan Main Line
Gojo Station (of the Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on the Keihan Main Line
Gojo Station (of the Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on the Keihan Main Line

sen.j: 2008年度に清水五条駅へ改称される予定。
sen.e: The name is scheduled to be changed to Kiyomizu-gojo Station in the fiscal 2008.
The name is scheduled to be changed to Kiyomizu-gojo Station in fiscal 2008.
The name is scheduled to be changed to Kiyomizu-gojo Station in fiscal year 2008.
sen.cmt: fiscal → fiscal yearに変更しました。

sen.j: 五条駅 (京都市営地下鉄) - 京都市下京区にある京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の駅。
sen.e: Gojo Station (of Kyoto City Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward of Kyoto city on Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway.
Gojo Station (of Kyoto City Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward of Kyoto City on the Kyoto City Subway's Karasuma Line
Gojo Station (of Kyoto Municipal Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward of Kyoto City on the Kyoto Municipal Subway's Karasuma Line

sen.j: 五条駅 (奈良県) - 奈良県五條市にある西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）和歌山線の駅。
sen.e: Gojo Station (Nara Prefecture) - a station in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture on Wakayama Line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West)
Gojo Station (Nara Prefecture) - a station in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture on the Wakayama Line of the West Japan Railway Company (JR West)
Gojo Station (Nara Prefecture) - a station in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture on the Wakayama Line of the West Japan Railway Company (JR West)

sen.j: 西鉄五条駅 - 福岡県太宰府市にある西鉄太宰府線の駅。
sen.e: Nishitetsu-Gojo Station - a station in Dazaifu City, Fukuoka Prefecture on Nishitetsu Dazaifu Line
